DOC.brief_summary: The present Ph.D.-study investigates the mechanisms behind the association between thyroid autoimmunity and reproductive failure.
DOC.brief_title: Thyroid Autoimmunity and Reproductive Failure in Danish Women
DOC.criteria: Women followed in the Fertility Clinic Pregnancy at time of blood sampling. Immunesuppressive ‚ÅÑmodulatory treatments. Women referred for oocyt donation, genetic testing, and hepatitis and HIVpositivity
